# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler (position (111.5, -32.0)), and offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)).

### Water pipe network at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position (107.5, -33.5)), multiple pipes (positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -33.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -31.5)).

### Steam pipe network at position (117.5, -34.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (117.5, -30.5)), multiple pipes (positions (117.5, -34.5), (118.5, -34.5), (119.5, -34.5), (119.5, -27.5), (118.5, -27.5), (120.5, -27.5)).

### Furnace at position (62.0, -54.0)
Consists of furnace (position (62.0, -54.0)).

### Belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)
Consists of two belts (positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)).

# ERROR TIPS
* Errors when inserting items into entities: 
  - Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities.
* Errors when using entities without fuel: 
  - Make sure to add fuel to entities that require it before using them.
* Errors when entities are not connected: 
  - Ensure that entities are properly connected to each other before using them.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* Important variables:
  - `transport-belt`: 8
  - `small-electric-pole`: 1
  - `wood`: 7
  - `iron-ore`: 10
  - `copper-ore`: 10
  - `iron-plate`: 7
  - `copper-plate`: 5
  - `copper-cable`: 2
  - `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
